title: Divyam Diamond Haaram Pendant - Timeless Elegance
materials: G Color). Exquisitely crafted with a lustrous Hyderabadi polish for enduring brilliance.
features: This Haaram pendant showcases intricate filigree work inspired by traditional South Indian floral motifs. Delicately set brilliant cut diamonds accentuate the curves and create a mesmerizing sparkle. Features a classic round gold ball at the bottom of the pendant.
colors: Predominantly yellow gold with shimmering white diamonds
creating a radiant and sophisticated look.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions such as weddings (vivaham)
and festive celebrations. It's also a wonderful statement piece for modern parties and gatherings.
description: This diamond Haaram pendant is a testament to timeless elegance and exquisite craftsmanship. The Hyderabadi polish ensures enduring brilliance, while the classic design makes it a versatile piece to cherish for generations. The dazzling diamonds add a touch of luxury and sophistication to any outfit.
